list.name: PIGGY-BANK
list.description: Griff drops a firecracker-filled piggy bank that explodes after a short delay, destroying obstacles and dealing x damage to opponents within range.
list.descriptionHtml: Griff drops a firecracker-filled piggy bank that explodes after a short delay, destroying obstacles and dealing x damage to opponents within range.

list.name: COIN-SHOWER
list.description: Griff's next Coin Toss shoots x% more coins.
list.descriptionHtml: Griff's next Coin Toss shoots x% more coins.
